scripts.dev: nodemon --watch client/src --ext "html,scss,js,mjs,ts,json" -x "yarn build:client-app && npx wrangler pages dev public --local --live-reload"
scripts.build:client-app: rm -rf public && parcel build client/src/index.html --dist-dir public
scripts.publish:to-pages: yarn build:client-app && npx wrangler pages publish public
